title: Application Name
description: Name of the application.

title: Author
description: Author of the application.

title: Creation Date
description: Date the application was created.

title: Version
description: Version of the application.

title: Classification
description: Classification/type of the application.

title: Container Image
description: OCI-compliant container image (mandatory parameter).

title: Commands
description: List of startup commands.

title: Arguments
description: Arguments passed to the application container.

title: Environment Variables
description: Environment variables in key-value format.

title: Minimum CPU
description: Minimum required CPU.

title: Minimum Memory (GB)
description: Minimum required memory in GB.

title: Maximum CPU
description: Maximum allowed CPU.

title: Maximum Memory (GB)
description: Maximum allowed memory in GB.

title: Relationships
description: Relationships such as volumes, other containers, and node selectors.

title: Behaviour
description: Deployment strategy and orchestration behaviour (type, replicas, restart policy, cron, etc.).

title: Security Config
description: Secrets, credentials, keys, and firewall rules.

title: Instance Type
description: Type of instance: General or Optimised (CPU/RAM/Storage/GPU).

title: Number of CPUs
description: Number of CPUs required (exact or range).

title: Memory RAM
description: Memory requirement (exact or range).

title: Number of GPUs
description: Number of GPUs required.

title: Disk Size
description: Disk size requirement (exact or range).

title: Network Bandwidth
description: Network bandwidth requirement (exact or range).

title: Number of Instances
description: Number of instances required.

title: Energy Type
description: Energy type preference (Green, Brown, Mix).

title: Security Rules
description: Firewall/security rules including whitelists and ports.

title: Maximum Price
description: Maximum price user is willing to pay for resource unit.

title: Location
description: Preferred location of resource (continent, country, city, GPS).

title: Preferred Capacity Provider
description: Preferred capacity provider (e.g., ACME Corp).

title: Preferred Resource Type
description: Preferred type of resource (Cloud/Edge).

title: Preferred Provider Type
description: Preferred provider type (Public/Private).

title: Preferred Resource Provider
description: Preferred specific providers with weights (e.g., Amazon 70%, Azure 50%).

title: Minimise Power Usage
description: Indicates if power usage should be minimised.

title: Energy Budget
description: Energy budget in kWh per hour.

title: Minimise Cost
description: Indicates if cost should be minimised.

title: Cost Budget
description: Maximum cost budget (Â£/hour).

title: Trust Level
description: Overall trust level score (percentage).

title: Response Time (ms)
description: Response time in milliseconds. Example: Rt >= 50 ms & Rt <= 100 ms.

title: Requests per Second
description: Number of requests per second (throughput requirement).

title: IOPS
description: IOPS (Input/Output operations per second).

title: IO Throughput (bps)
description: IO Throughput measured in bits per second.

title: Net Throughput (bps)
description: Net Throughput measured in bits per second.

title: Database Writes
description: Number of database writes per second required.

title: Custom Attributes
description: Custom attributes in key-value format (e.g., {"latency":"<50ms"}).

title: Custom Scaling Rules
description: Custom scaling rules with higher priority over AI decision making in case of conflict.

title: Resource Provider
description: The provider of the resources, where they run (e.g., Amazon, Azure, UoW, Sztaki, edge provider).

title: Capacity Provider
description: The provider of the capacity (e.g., ACME Corporation).

title: Resource Type
description: The type of resource: Cloud or Edge.

title: Instance Types
description: Supported instance types and specifications (CPU, RAM, storage).

title: Resource Quota
description: Available capacity as CPU/RAM/Memory quota. Either use resource_quota or instance_quota.

title: Price
description: Price for resource usage (based on instance type, utilisation, or entire edge device).

title: Locality
description: Geographic location(s) of resources: continent, country, city, GPS. Multiple values possible.

title: Locality
description: Geographic location(s) of resources: continent, country, city, GPS. Multiple values possible.

title: Operating System
description: Supported operating systems with IDs (limited to Debian, Ubuntu, CentOS).

title: Architecture
description: Supported architecture types (e.g., x86, ARM).

title: Energy Type
description: Type of energy used: Green, Brown, Mix.

title: Powered Type
description: Power source type: Battery powered or Mains powered.

title: Energy Consumption
description: Energy demand based on instance type, CPU/memory usage, or edge device.

title: Accessible Sensors
description: Sensors accessible through local network from edge machine.

title: Devices
description: Details of additional devices (e.g., Hardware: GPU, Software: CUDA).

title: Mobility
description: Indicates whether the device is mobile (true/false).

title: Security Ports
description: List of ports that the resource allows to be opened.

title: Trust
description: Trust level of the resource (definition TBD).

title: Access Credentials
description: Credentials for accessing the resource (e.g., SSH keys).

title: Access Endpoints
description: Endpoints for accessing the resource.

title: Bandwidth (Mbps)
description: Capacity of data transfer supported (Mbps).

title: Connectivity Type
description: Connectivity type: wired, wifi, 4G, 5G.

title: Network Stability
description: Network stability (TBD definition).

title: Network Access
description: Network access type: Public / Private / Community.

title: Description
description: The description of the capacity

title: Name
description: Name of the instance type.

title: Number of CPUs
description: Number of CPUs required (exact or range).

title: Memory Size
description: Memory requirement (exact or range).

title: Disk Size
description: Disk size requirement (exact or range).

title: Energy Consumption
description: Energy demand based on instance type, CPU/memory usage, or edge device.

title: Bandwidth
description: Capacity of data transfer supported (Mbps).

title: Price
description: Price for resource usage (based on instance type, utilisation, or entire edge device).

title: UUID
description: The UUID of the instance type.

title: Type
description: Type of instance: General or Optimised (CPU/RAM/Storage/GPU).

title: Name
description: Name of the instance type.

title: Number of CPUs
description: Number of CPUs required (exact or range).

title: RAM (GB)
description: Memory requirement (exact or range).

title: Storage (GB)
description: Disk size requirement (exact or range).

title: Architecture
description: Capacity of data transfer supported (Mbps).

title: Energy Consumption (kWh)
description: Energy demand based on instance type, CPU/memory usage, or edge device.

title: Price (per Hour)
description: Price for resource usage (based on instance type, utilisation, or entire edge device).

title: Quota
description: Available capacity as number of instances. Either use resource_quota or instance_quota.

title: Continent
description: Country of the edge/cloud resource. e.g. Europe.

title: Country
description: Country of the edge/cloud resource. e.g. United Kingdom.

title: City
description: City of the edge/cloud resource. e.g. London.

title: GPS Location
description: GPS location of the edge device. e.g. 51.509865, -0.118092.
